1386210.name: Queen's Garden 2
1386210.description:
In Queen's Garden 2, the Princess became a queen! Help her loyal assistant Jack rebuild the royal garden from scratch in this unique match 3 game.

Play over 130 levels, collect coins and special jewels, purchase plants and decorations to design the greatest garden the Kingdom has ever seen. Join Jack and the Queen in this adventure and smell the scent of the roses!
1386210.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
